description: A runner not far from the finish line at the 2014 Los Angeles Marathon was so exhausted, two good Samaritans helped him finish the race.
maintext: A runner not far from the finish line at the 2014 Los Angeles Marathon was so exhausted, two good Samaritans helped him finish the race.The struggling marathoner, drenched in sweat and stumbling as he walked, was held by two strangers on each side of him.Both helpers appear to cheer him on as all three approach the finish line together.
title: Good Samaritans help exhausted runner finish LA Marathon
